extended_event_descriptor.text: Master mechanic Fuzz Townshend and parts-blagging petrol head Tim Shaw are back for a brand new season of the fan favourite car show.

Wicked Tuna follows a group of salty fishermen from the nation's oldest seaport, Gloucester, Massachusetts, as they make their living the way it's been done for centuries-rod and reel fishing, one catch at a time-all in pursuit of the bluefin tuna.

short_event_descriptor.name: The Big Picure with Kal Penn

short_event_descriptor.name: The Big Picure with Kal Penn

extended_event_descriptor.text: Uncovering surprising facts on topics like money, sex, food and sport. Uses maps and other visuals to reveal how our world works.

Host Neil deGrasse Tyson brings together celebrities, scientists and comedians to explore a variety of cosmic topics and collide pop culture with science in a way that late-night television has never seen before.

In 1914, Europe is in the 'Belle poque'. But on June 28 in Sarajevo, Archduke Franz Ferdinand is assassinated by a Bosnian nationalist.
British light infantry must take and hold two key bridges in Northern France in order to secure the beachheads and break out of Normandy.
In 1914, Europe is in the 'Belle poque'. But on June 28 in Sarajevo, Archduke Franz Ferdinand is assassinated by a Bosnian nationalist.
